product.title: Odio Wireless Microphone For Type C Devices (WM2c)
product.description:
Specifications:
Brand: Odio
Product name: Wireless microphone
Type of microphone: capacitive
Directivity: omnidirectional
Frequency response: 50HZ-18khz
SNR: 64dBm
Open barrier-free effective distance: ≈20 meters (65.6 feet)
Human body barrier use distance: ≈7 meters (22.9 feet)
Charging time: 1.5 hours
Duration: about 5.5 hours
Charging input: 5V/1A.

product.title: Multifunctional Food Grinder – 0924
product.description:
Features:
Effortlessly grinds spices and dry ingredients in seconds.
Keeps your family safe from harmful additives in store-bought spices.
Allows you to grind fresh spices at home for better health and flavor.
Perfect for dry chilies, turmeric, black pepper, cardamom, fenugreek, mustard, cinnamon, rice, lentils, nuts, and more.
Time-Saving: Grind any ingredient into powder in just 10 seconds.
User-Friendly Design: Press the On/Off button to start grinding, release to stop.
Ideal for kitchens looking to save time and effort.

product.title: QCY Watch GS Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch
product.description:
Key Features:
Vivid Display: The 2.02-inch HD TFT display with a resolution of 320*385 pixels ensures sharp and detailed visuals.
Customizable Watch Faces: Access over 100 beautiful watch faces via the QCY APP to match your mood and style.
Health Monitoring: The built-in 24-hour heart rate monitor provides continuous tracking and alerts for potential heart conditions.
Fitness Tracking: Supports over 100 sports modes, making it the perfect companion for various workouts with high-accuracy sensors for calorie burn and workout duration.
Extended Battery Life: Equipped with low-power consumption chips, the QCY Watch GS boasts an impressive 10-day battery life on a single charge.
Personalization:
Choose from a variety of watch faces to match your style.
Customize your smartwatch to mirror your unique preferences.
Health and Fitness:
24-hour heart rate monitoring for proactive health management.
Over 100 sports modes for versatile fitness tracking.
Accurate sensors for detailed insights into your workout progress.
